ComicInfo.Summary: Holo-ween [Part 3]: Picard, Riker, Worf, and Troi, having been transformed into monsters are able to resist Redjac's influence and rescue Data from Redjac's control. As Redjac continues to hold other crew members under his control, the Enterprise crew gets unexpected help from the surprise arrival of someone who has faced Redjac previously.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 22:25:20. [CVDB1025416] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:06:04. [Issue ID 2573460]
